segments.text: Have you ever been to Xi ’ an ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ Ve been there several times on business trips . But I have never really seen the terra-cotta warriors as it is outside the city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ Ve heard many people saying that it is a place worth touring . I really want to see the old walls and terra-cotta warriors one day . Of course I won ’ t miss the local food either . You know , the sites interests a food in scenery , food is a key factor when visiting a place .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . As long as the food is not too bizarre once I saw some people eating insects . That is frightening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure it is . Is it convenient to get there by plane ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the airport is quite far from the downtown area , but it is still more convenient than taking the train .
segments.speaker: S2
